head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ATON, BRUCE ROSS

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ATON, BRUCE ROSS

block.p: ATON-Bruce Ross. September 1, 2000. Age 82. At Southern Ocean County Hospital, Manahawkin, N.J. Born in Reedsburg, WI. Resident of Brant Beach, N.J. for the past six years. Formerly of Mahwah, N.J. Marketing V.P. for Rheem Manufacturing, Linden, N.J. and New York City. Survived by wife Helen Marie (nee Fay), and four sons and one sister, eight grandchildren. Funeral was from Thos L. Shinn Funeral Home, 10 Hilliard Drive, Manahawkin, NJ.

ATON-Bruce Ross. September 1, 2000. Age 82. At Southern Ocean County Hospital, Manahawkin, N.J. Born in Reedsburg, WI. Resident of Brant Beach, N.J. for the past six years. Formerly of Mahwah, N.J. Marketing V.P. for Rheem Manufacturing, Linden, N.J. and New York City. Survived by wife Helen Marie (nee Fay), and four sons and one sister, eight grandchildren. Funeral was from Thos L. Shinn Funeral Home, 10 Hilliard Drive, Manahawkin, NJ.
